description:
The annual Buddyfight tournament is approaching, and it has everyone buzzing. Noboru meets an unexpected ally. Tetsuya gets some creative help when he needs it most. And a tense disagreement between Gao and Baku leaves Koguru trying and pick up the pieces.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Deck Builder wa Shouri no Aibou!
デッキビルダーは勝利の相棒!
